text.__SUMMARY__: Common names: (none).Bothrops taeniatus lichenosus is a venomous pitviper subspecies endemic to South America and known only from one locality in Bolívar State, Venezuela.
text.Description: Same as for B. t. taeniatus, except that B. t. lichenosus has fewer ventral scales and fewer subcaudal scales.
text.Geographic range: It is found in South America and known only from the type locality, which is "Chimantá Tepui, Estado Bolívar, Venezuela".
